VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Soybeans?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Soybeans is arc {Sugarcane}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Sugarcane?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Sugarcane is arc {Soybeans}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Sugarcane to Potatoes in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Soybeans to Potatoes in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Potatoes and Wheat in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Potatoes and Wheat is {593}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Potatoes and Sugarcane in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Potatoes and Sugarcane is {213}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Potatoes?
SC.A: The total flow output from Potatoes is {1179}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Soybeans?
SC.A: The total flow input by Soybeans is {794}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 574? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {705} from {Sugarcane} to {Wheat}, a flow of {647} from {Wheat} to {Sugarcane}, a flow of {593} from {Wheat} to {Potatoes}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 236? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {213} from {Potatoes} to {Sugarcane}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 397 and 442? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {410} from {Potatoes} to {Soybeans}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Wheat to Potatoes or from Soybeans to Potatoes?
NC.A: The flow from {Wheat} to {Potatoes} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Soybeans to Potatoes, from Wheat to Sugarcane, or from Potatoes to Soybeans?
NC.A: The flow from {Wheat} to {Sugarcane} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Sugarcane}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Sugarcane} and {Wheat}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Wheat, Arc Sugarcane, Arc Potatoes, Arc Soybeans}.
